decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Drawings EX00, EX01, EX02, EX03, EX04, EX05 Rev A, EX06 Rev A, EX07 Rev A, EX08 Rev A, S01, S02, and Daylighting Impact Assessment ref 1623/ND Rev A received: 03/08/2017. PL00 Rev B, PL02 Rev B, PL03 Rev B, PL04 Rev B, PL05 Rev B, and PL06 Rev B received: 05/09/2017. Flood Risk Assessment, PL01 Rev C, PL07 Rev C, and PL08 Rev C received: 26/09/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey side, rear infill and rear extension and installation of two roof windows to the rear pitched roof of the house
